question: The UIDAI data centre is located at which of the following places?
explanation: The UIDAI data centre is located at the Industrial Model Township (IMT), Manesar, Haryana. It was inaugurated by the then Chief Minister of Haryana Bhupinder Singh Hooda on 7 January 2013. Aadhaar data is kept in about 7,000 servers in Bengaluru and Manesar.
